abstract.p: Weekly update of residential sales by region; photo; map; graphs (L)

block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$595,000 303 East 43rd Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. condo in postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, renovated kitchen, 10-ft. ceilings, marble baths, parquet floors; common charge $850; taxes $9,000; listed at $600,000, 1 week on market (Broker: A. J. Clarke)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$595,000 303 East 43rd Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. condo in postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, renovated kitchen, 10-ft. ceilings, marble baths, parquet floors; common charge $850; taxes $9,000; listed at $600,000, 1 week on market (Broker: A. J. Clarke)

$835,000 146 West Fourth Street 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar loft building; elevator, renovated kitchen and baths, high ceilings, 450 sq. ft. of private roof space; maintenance $1,159, 38% tax-deductible; listed at $845,000, 26 weeks on market (Brokers: Eychner Associates; Corcoran Group)

$750,000 420 West 144th Street 2-family, 4-story brownstone; 2 bedrooms, 2 1/2 baths, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, double-height windows, guest room in primary triplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in simplex; landmark district, 16-by-80-ft. lot; taxes $1,248; listed at $799,000, 37 weeks on market (Brokers: Willie Kathryn Suggs; William B. May)

$589,000 301 East 79th Street (Continental Towers) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, balcony, common roof deck; common charge $471; taxes $6,120; listed at $599,000, 5 weeks on market (Brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Bellmarc)

$5.7 million 171 West 57th Street (Briarcliff) 4-bedroom, 6-bath, 5,500-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed eat-in kitchen, c/a, 2 fireplaces; common charge $4,792; taxes $11,808; listed at $6.3 million, 24 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$380,000 171 Fordham Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 140-year-old Victorian; dining room, finished attic, h/ w floors, original moldings and detail, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,500; listed at $385,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall)

$210,000 2601 Henry Hudson Parkway (Riviera) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; part-time doormen, dining area, terrace, Hudson River view; maintenance $812, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $227,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: John Edwards Real Estate)

$355,000 223 88th Street 2-family, 60-year-old colonial; 3 bedrooms, 1 bath, dining room, eat-in kitchen in each unit; 2-car garage, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,250; listed at $375,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Velsor)

$275,000 340 11th Street 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. triplex condo in a 10-year-old building; elevator, common roof deck; common charge $213, 100% tax-abated; listed at $275,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Aguayo & Huebener)

$380,000 67-25 Ingram Street 3-bedroom, 1 full- and 2 half-baths, 60-year-old attached Tudor; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces, finished basement, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,000; listed at $399,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Kingdom)

$340,000 173-15 67th Avenue 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 55-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, renovated kitchen, finished basement, new windows and boiler, 1-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,036; listed at $339,888 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$155,500 21 Francesca Lane 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 12-year-old attached town house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, rear deck, 1-car garage, 28-by-91-ft. lot; taxes $1,458; listed at $149,900 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Salmon)

$415,000 12 Greenknoll Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 12-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, den, vaulted ceilings, fireplace, whirlpool, 2-car garage, .67-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $5,815; listed at $397,000 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$1.695 million 17 Carrington Drive 6-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 43-year-old ranch renovated in 1997; dining room, library, family room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, 2-car garage, 4.3-acre lot; taxes $12,374; listed at $1.695 million, 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; New England Land Co.)

$349,900 21 Columbia Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2 bath, 20-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen with pantry, family room with cathedral ceilings, rear deck, 2-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $4,295; listed at $349,900, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$300,000 602 Bread and Cheese Hollow Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 50-year-old expanded Cape Cod; great room, dining room, fireplace in master bedroom, full basement, 1-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $5,676; listed at $299,000 (multiple bids), 8 weeks on market (Broker: Anastasio)

$510,000 48 Picadilly Road 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 62-year-old brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, screened porch, rear deck, 2-car garage; taxes $5,400; listed at $595,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: June Shapiro Real Estate)

$305,000 1623 Hewlett Avenue 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 60-year-old expanded ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 64-by-95-ft. lot; taxes $3,900, listed at $305,000 3 weeks on market (Broker: Jan Kalman Realty)

$460,000 659 Arbuckle Avenue 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 36-year-old high ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen with skylight, den with wet bar, spa room with whirlpool, 2-car garage, 65-by-93-ft. lot; taxes $7,192; listed at $485,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Jan Kalman)

$280,000 1119 Stafford Road 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,560-sq.-ft., 8-year-old condo town house; patio, fireplace, 1-car garage; common charge $115; taxes $2,925; listed at $280,000, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens; Abbott & Caserta)

$710,000 26 Christopher Place 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 35-year-old colonial; 5 fireplaces, full basement, 4-car garage, new roof, 2-acre lot; taxes $5,300; listed at $749,000, 6 months on market (Brokers: Terrie O'Connor Realtors; Coldwell Banker)

$447,000 51 Hill Road 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 54-year-old ranch; fireplace, c/a, finished basement, 1-car garage, 0.67-acre lot; taxes $5,055; listed at $529,900, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Weichert; Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens)

$962,500 9 Larchmont Avenue 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 49-year-old split-level; marble entry hall, fireplace, dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, study, patio, 2-car garage; 103-by-105-ft. lot; taxes $17,060; listed at $1.05 million, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Merritt Associates)

$295,000 94 Magnolia Avenue 7-bedroom, 2-bath, 140-year-old colonial; center hall, dining room, 2 marble fireplaces, pillars, porches, detached 1-car garage; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $7,575; listed at $319,500, 14 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Ragette)

$470,000 140 Norman Road 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 57-year-old colonial; screened porch, patio, dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, marble bathroom, attached 1-car garage; 80-by-88-ft. lot; taxes $9,252; listed at $489,000, 11 weeks on market (Brokers: Houlihan/Lawrence; Merritt Associates)

$110,000 48 Pocantico Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft., 11-year-old town-house condo; entry hall, updated eat-in kitchen, 1-car garage; common charge $130; taxes $3,300; listed at $119,000, 20 weeks on market (Brokers: Nelson-Vrooman Associates; Houlihan/Lawrence)
